page.title: 05AROUND THRESHERS BUSH.
page.content: S.W. Corner :{490090}At first sight a restful rural backwater & yet powerful unseen forces are at work forcing changes which would have seemed unimaginable only 30 years ago. The church of All Saints :{492093}stands empty, a testimony to a bygone age and a transformation of rural lifestyles. Roffey Hall Farm:{498098}extends over 700 acres. It is operated as a contiguous unit with a similar farm in the nearby village of Matching. Cereals & potatoes form the core crops but there are economic pressures to grow more oil seed rape ; a 'cash crop' & now more profitable than wheat. The farm employs 8 persons, 2 of whom are sons of the owner & who function in a managerial capacity. The potato crop is set in March/April.When lifted they
